12 static const uint64_t VarInt16MaxValues[] =
13 {
14  (UINT64_C(1) << (6)) - 1,
15  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 8)) - 1,
16 };
17 static const size_t VarInt16MaxNumValues = sizeof(VarInt16MaxValues) / sizeof(VarInt16MaxValues[0]);
18 
19 static const uint64_t VarInt32MaxValues[] =
20 {
21  (UINT64_C(1) << (6)) - 1,
22  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7)) - 1,
23  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7 + 7)) - 1,
24  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7 + 7 + 8)) - 1
25 };
26 static const size_t VarInt32MaxNumValues = sizeof(VarInt32MaxValues) / sizeof(VarInt32MaxValues[0]);
27 
28 static const uint64_t VarInt64MaxValues[] =
29 {
30  (UINT64_C(1) << (6)) - 1,
31  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7)) - 1,
32  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7 + 7)) - 1,
33  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7 + 7 + 7)) - 1,

37  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7 + 7 + 7 + 7 + 7 + 7 + 8)) - 1
38 };

71 {
72  (UINT64_C(1) << (6)) - 1,
73  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7)) - 1,
74  (UINT64_C(1) << (6 + 7 + 7)) - 1,

84 static const uint64_t VarUIntMaxValues[] =
85 {
86  (UINT64_C(1) << (7)) - 1,
87  (UINT64_C(1) << (7 + 7)) - 1,
88  (UINT64_C(1) << (7 + 7 + 7)) - 1,

94  UINT64_MAX
95 };
96 static const size_t VarUIntMaxNumValues = sizeof(VarUIntMaxValues) / sizeof(VarUIntMaxValues[0]);
97 
98 static const uint64_t VarSizeMaxValues[] =
99 {
100  (UINT64_C(1) << (7)) - 1,
101  (UINT64_C(1) << (7 + 7)) - 1,
102  (UINT64_C(1) << (7 + 7 + 7)) - 1,
103  (UINT64_C(1) << (7 + 7 + 7 + 7)) - 1,
104  (UINT64_C(1) << (2 + 7 + 7 + 7 + 8)) - 1,
105 };
106 static const size_t VarSizeMaxNumValues = sizeof(VarSizeMaxValues) / sizeof(VarSizeMaxValues[0]);
107 
108 static size_t bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(uint64_t value, const uint64_t* maxValues, size_t numMaxValues,
109  const char* varIntName)
110 {
111  const uint64_t* maxValue = maxValues;
112  size_t byteSize = 1;
113  for (; byteSize <= numMaxValues; ++byteSize)
114  {
115  if (value <= *maxValue)
116  break;
117  maxValue++;
118  }
119 
120  if (byteSize > numMaxValues)
121  {
122  throw CppRuntimeException("BitSizeOfCalculator: Value '" + convertToString(value) +
123  "' is out of range for " + std::string(varIntName) + "!");
124  }
125 
126  return bytesToBits(byteSize);
127 }
128 
129 template <typename T>
130 static uint64_t convertToAbsValue(T value)
131 {
132  return static_cast<uint64_t>((value < 0) ? -value : value);
133 }
134 
135 size_t bitSizeOfVarInt16(int16_t value)
136 {
137  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(convertToAbsValue(value), VarInt16MaxValues, VarInt16MaxNumValues, "varint16");
138 }
139 
140 size_t bitSizeOfVarInt32(int32_t value)
141 {
142  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(convertToAbsValue(value), VarInt32MaxValues, VarInt32MaxNumValues, "varint32");
143 }
144 
145 size_t bitSizeOfVarInt64(int64_t value)
146 {
147  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(convertToAbsValue(value), VarInt64MaxValues, VarInt64MaxNumValues, "varint64");
148 }
149 
150 size_t bitSizeOfVarUInt16(uint16_t value)
151 {
152  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(value, VarUInt16MaxValues, VarUInt16MaxNumValues, "varuint16");
153 }
154 
155 size_t bitSizeOfVarUInt32(uint32_t value)
156 {
157  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(value, VarUInt32MaxValues, VarUInt32MaxNumValues, "varuint32");
158 }
159 
160 size_t bitSizeOfVarUInt64(uint64_t value)
161 {
162  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(value, VarUInt64MaxValues, VarUInt64MaxNumValues, "varuint64");
163 }
164 
165 size_t bitSizeOfVarInt(int64_t value)
166 {
167  if (value == INT64_MIN)
168  return 8; // INT64_MIN is stored as -0
169 
170  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(convertToAbsValue(value), VarIntMaxValues, VarIntMaxNumValues, "varint");
171 }
172 
173 size_t bitSizeOfVarUInt(uint64_t value)
174 {
175  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(value, VarUIntMaxValues, VarUIntMaxNumValues, "varuint");
176 }
177 
178 size_t bitSizeOfVarSize(uint32_t value)
179 {
180  return bitSizeOfVarIntImpl(value, VarSizeMaxValues, VarSizeMaxNumValues, "varsize");
181 }
182 
183 size_t bitSizeOfString(const std::string& stringValue)
184 {
185  const size_t stringSize = stringValue.size();
186 
187  // the string consists of varsize for size followed by the UTF-8 encoded string
188  return bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(stringSize)) + bytesToBits(stringSize);
189 }
190 
191 size_t bitSizeOfBitBuffer(const BitBuffer& bitBuffer)
192 {
193  const size_t bitBufferSize = bitBuffer.getBitSize();
194 
195  // bit buffer consists of varsize for bit size followed by the bits
196  return bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(bitBufferSize)) + bitBufferSize;
197 }
